title: 15 d ban ?
body: so I got an understandable 15 day ban. 20~ days later I still have no email and I'm still banned for 15 days. My assumption is I was banned twice for 15 days? But how can I confirm this?

replies.body: You were banned on the 25th. Your ban is not over until tomorrow @ 2017-11-08 20:27:20 UTC.

Hello Tantram, 

I have one question. Is it possible, that after 14 - day ban, can I have again a "clean" account, if I behaved well over a long period of time? I mean, that another punishment will be chat restriction for 10 games, not perma ban.
Send a ticket in to Player Support -- that doesn't sound like a normal situation, to my knowledge.
